component.name: RustConn
component.summary: Modern connection manager for Linux (SSH, RDP, VNC, SPICE, Zero Trust)

description.p: RustConn is a modern connection manager for Linux desktops built with GTK4. It provides a unified interface for managing SSH, RDP, VNC, SPICE, and Zero Trust remote connections with support for both embedded and external clients. Supports custom console-based connections and integrates with secret managers.

ul.li: SSH connections with embedded terminal and split view
RDP support via FreeRDP/IronRDP (embedded and external)
VNC support via TigerVNC (embedded and external)
SPICE support via virt-viewer (embedded and external)
Zero Trust providers: AWS SSM, GCP IAP, Azure Bastion, OCI Bastion, Cloudflare, Teleport, Tailscale, Boundary
Custom console-based connections
Connection groups, tags, and templates
Import/export (Remmina, Asbru-CM, SSH config, Ansible)
Secure credential storage (KeePassXC, libsecret)
Connection history and statistics
Session logging
Command snippets and cluster commands
Wake-on-LAN
